attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abolish "Fast track" immigration controls  and customs inspections at our National and Regional Airports  for VIPs, Politicians, Diplomats and Royalty making them suffer in the same way that the rest of us do!
Perhaps in this way, some thought might be given to improving procedures and increasing the number of staff on duty.

rejection.details: you need to create a title for your petition - not use your name
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
